translated: Homage to the disciples of the Buddhas, homage to the teachers, homage to the disciples of the teachers.
May what I recite be accomplished as I wish.
If a person gets a disease of qi,
Tie a thread seven times and recite the spell over it.
And write the names of the ghosts and spirits above.
If on paper or locust tree bark.
Tie it to the end of the thread.
One should fast, be pure, rinse the mouth, and burn incense.
Only when the mind is upright can one speak of it.
The Sutra of the Buddha's Recitation of the Dhāraṇī for Curing Illnesses
